The fundamental base for all arithmetic in the network. It holds a reference to the backpropgation graph as well as the values of the forward pass.

with
metadata.

computed property provides backward-compatible access as a 3D
array.

This helper function is used by the arithmetic operators (+, -, *, /) to determine
if broadcasting is possible and which axis should be used.

Performs element-wise subtraction between two tensors with automatic broadcasting support.
